title: RocketMQ Installation - WSL2/UBUNTU
content:
##### Specs and requirement
WSL2
rocketmq version : release 5.0.0
link: https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/archive/refs/tags/rocketmq-all-5.0.0.tar.gz
java version : openjdk-8-amd64
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
``` bash
sudo apt install openjdk-8-jdk
java -version
openjdk version "1.8.0_352"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_352-8u352-ga-1~20.04-b08)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.352-b08, mixed mode)
nano ~/.bash_profile
    export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64
    export ROCKETMQ_HOME=/opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/distribution/target/rocketmq-5.0.0/rocketmq-5.0.0
    export PATH=$ROCKETMQ_HOME/bin:$PATH
source ~/.bash_profile ## to refresh latest update.
```
#### TO CHECK PATH
 echo $ROCKETMQ_HOME   
 /////opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/distribution/target/rocketmq-5.0.0/rocketmq-5.0.0
 echo $JAVA_HOME

``` bash
> cd /opt
> wget https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/archive/refs/tags/rocketmq-all-5.0.0.tar.gz
> cd /opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/
> mvn -Prelease-all -DskipTests clean install -U
```
#### Build complete - ready for next step.
``` bash
[INFO] Installing /opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/distribution/target/rocketmq-5.0.0.zip to /home/vincey/.m2/repository/org/apache/rocketmq/rocketmq-distribution/5.0.0/rocketmq-distribution-5.0.0.zip
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Reactor Summary for Apache RocketMQ 5.0.0 5.0.0:
[INFO]
[INFO] Apache RocketMQ 5.0.0 .............................. SUCCESS [01:09 min]
[INFO] rocketmq-logging 5.0.0 ............................. SUCCESS [ 34.802 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-remoting 5.0.0 ............................ SUCCESS [ 45.342 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-common 5.0.0 .............................. SUCCESS [ 53.854 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-client 5.0.0 .............................. SUCCESS [ 20.222 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-store 5.0.0 ............................... SUCCESS [ 25.022 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-srvutil 5.0.0 ............................. SUCCESS [  5.398 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-filter 5.0.0 .............................. SUCCESS [  3.935 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-acl 5.0.0 ................................. SUCCESS [ 15.476 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-broker 5.0.0 .............................. SUCCESS [ 46.552 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-tools 5.0.0 ............................... SUCCESS [ 10.486 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-controller 5.0.0 .......................... SUCCESS [  5.169 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-namesrv 5.0.0 ............................. SUCCESS [ 12.627 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-proxy 5.0.0 ............................... SUCCESS [ 33.403 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-container 5.0.0 ........................... SUCCESS [  4.208 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-test 5.0.0 ................................ SUCCESS [ 19.495 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-openmessaging 5.0.0 ....................... SUCCESS [  5.015 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-example 5.0.0 ............................. SUCCESS [ 28.397 s]
[INFO] rocketmq-distribution 5.0.0 ........................ SUCCESS [04:38 min]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  11:58 min
[INFO] Finished at: 2023-01-26T17:21:57+08:00
```
cd to /opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/distribution/target/rocketmq-5.0.0/rocketmq-5.0.0

##### START NAMESERVER
``` bash
> nohup sh bin/mqnamesrv & tail -f ~/logs/rocketmqlogs/namesrv.log
> tail -f nohup.out
### nohup.out shown sucessfully start name server.
The Name Server boot success. serializeType=JSON
```
##### START Broker
``` bash
> nohup sh bin/mqbroker -n localhost:9876 --enable-proxy & tail -f ~/logs/rocketmqlogs/broker_default.log
> tail -f nohup.out
### nohup.out shown sucessfully start broker.
The broker[LAPTOP-F7AOJL27, 172.20.32.00:10911] boot success. serializeType=JSON
```


##### TO STOP NAMESERVER AND BROKER
``` bash
>  sh bin/mqshutdown broker
### shown shutdown successfully
The mqbroker(16375) is running...
Send shutdown request to mqbroker(16375) OK

> sh bin/mqshutdown namesrv
### shown shutdown successfully 
The mqnamesrv(15818) is running...
Send shutdown request to mqnamesrv(15818) OK
```


#### Allow PORT TO ACCESS IN WINDOWS 
``` bash
>  sudo nano /etc/wsl.conf

add the following lines to file:
[network]
generateHosts = true
generateResolvConf = true

Verify that the ports are open by running the following command on the Windows host:
> netstat -an | find "9876"


```


#### Permission Issue - grant permission
failed to compile the package
``` bash
sudo chown -R $USER:$USER /opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/target/
```


#### additional checking file existent 
 ls -l /opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/distribution/target/rocketmq-5.0.0/rocketmq-5.0.0/bin/runserver.sh
ls -l /opt/rocketmq-rocketmq-all-5.0.0/distribution/target/rocketmq-5.0.0/rocketmq-5.0.0/bin/mqbroker

title: Mqbroker cannot start. No Mqbroker is running.
content:
##### Observation:
###### rocketMq log Path: log/rocketmqlogs/
---
#### broker.log
``` bash
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - load /root/store/config/subscriptionGroup.json OK
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - load /root/store/config/consumerFilter.json OK
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - Try to start service thread:AllocateMappedFileService started:false lastThread:null
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - Try to shutdown service thread:AllocateMappedFileService started:true lastThread:Thread[AllocateMappedFileService,5,main]
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - shutdown thread AllocateMappedFileService interrupt true
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - join thread AllocateMappedFileService elapsed time(ms) 1 90000
2022-11-23 17:37:50 INFO main - Try to shutdown service thread:PullRequestHoldService started:false lastThread:null
```
#### broker_default.log
``` bash
2022-11-15 14:38:55 WARN main - Unknown channel option 'SO_KEEPALIVE' for channel '[id: 0xb9a74f62]'
2022-11-15 14:38:55 WARN main - Unknown channel option 'SO_KEEPALIVE' for channel '[id: 0x58284471]'

2022-11-24 10:03:14 INFO main - instrumented a special java.util.Set into: sun.nio.ch.EPollSelectorImpl@4f6ee6e4
2022-11-24 10:03:14 INFO main - instrumented a special java.util.Set into: sun.nio.ch.EPollSelectorImpl@15de0b3c
2022-11-24 10:03:14 INFO main - instrumented a special java.util.Set into: sun.nio.ch.EPollSelectorImpl@3c9754d8
2022-11-24 10:03:14 INFO main - instrumented a special java.util.Set into: sun.nio.ch.EPollSelectorImpl@3bf7ca37

2022-11-24 10:03:16 INFO main - Looking for a resource file of name [META-INF/service/org.apache.rocketmq.remoting.RPCHook] ...
2022-11-24 10:03:16 WARN main - No resource file with name [META-INF/service/org.apache.rocketmq.remoting.RPCHook] found.
```
#### store.log
``` bash
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO main - load consume queue OFFSET_MOVED_EVENT-0 OK
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO main - load logics queue all over, OK
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO main - store checkpoint file exists, /root/store/checkpoint
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO main - store checkpoint file physicMsgTimestamp 1669191612663, 20221123082012663
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO main - store checkpoint file logicsMsgTimestamp 1669191612663, 20221123082012663
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO main - store checkpoint file indexMsgTimestamp 0, 19700101000000000
2022-11-23 19:39:07 ERROR main - load exception
java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.lang.reflect.InaccessibleObjectException: Unable to make public java.lang.Object java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.attachment() accessible: module java.base does not "opens java.nio" to unnamed module @7be0cc22
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile$1.run(MappedFile.java:105)
	at java.base/java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(AccessController.java:318)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile.invoke(MappedFile.java:98)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile.viewed(MappedFile.java:130)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile.clean(MappedFile.java:94)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile.cleanup(MappedFile.java:439)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.ReferenceResource.release(ReferenceResource.java:63)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.ReferenceResource.shutdown(ReferenceResource.java:47)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile.destroy(MappedFile.java:447)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.index.IndexFile.destroy(IndexFile.java:89)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.index.IndexService.load(IndexService.java:71)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.DefaultMessageStore.load(DefaultMessageStore.java:209)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.broker.BrokerController.initialize(BrokerController.java:270)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.broker.BrokerStartup.createBrokerController(BrokerStartup.java:220)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.broker.BrokerStartup.main(BrokerStartup.java:57)
Caused by: java.lang.reflect.InaccessibleObjectException: Unable to make public java.lang.Object java.nio.DirectByteBuffer.attachment() accessible: module java.base does not "opens java.nio" to unnamed module @7be0cc22
	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject.checkCanSetAccessible(AccessibleObject.java:354)
	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject.checkCanSetAccessible(AccessibleObject.java:297)
	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.checkCanSetAccessible(Method.java:199)
	at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.setAccessible(Method.java:193)
	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.MappedFile$1.run(MappedFile.java:102)
	... 14 common frames omitted
2022-11-23 19:39:07 WARN AllocateMappedFileService - AllocateMappedFileService interrupted, possibly by shutdown.
2022-11-23 19:39:07 INFO AllocateMappedFileService - AllocateMappedFileService service end
```
---

### Solution
1. delete abort file in the root/store folder
    - start the mqbroker again
    - if issue still persist , use step 2.
2. delete root/store folder
   - restart rocketmq again , it will auto regenerate store folder. 
   - start the mqbroker again.
   - if issue still persist, proceed to step 3.
3. delete root/store folder, restart the server - sudo restart
   - start namesrv again 
   - start mqbroker again

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
